subNodes.conversationText: root
What can I do for you, <FirstName>?
I'd like to ask you some questions.
What would you like to know?
I don't think I have ever asked you how you and my father met.
I met your father in the Great Dwarven Halls as we were fleeing from Zorn's creatures.
Continue
Balen and your father were together.  Your father was very young at the time.
Continue
After your grandmother passed away, Balen took care of your father as he had promised Jena.
Continue
We traveled together and settled in Langdale before eventually moving to Brinsby.
Did you know my grandmother and grandfather?
I met her a few times, she was a very brave and kind lady.  She never would say anything about your grandfather or who he was.
Continue
Is there anything else you would like to ask?
Yes...
What would you like to know?
Not right now.
Do you think we will find more surviving Talking Beasts during our travels?
I don't know, but I still have hope that there are more survivors.
Continue
There are very few of us that I know of.  Vin visits Brinsby often, but not too many others.
Continue
Among Talking beast, Boone is probably my best friend.
Continue
He seems to spend more time in the forests these days.  I think he is starting to develop many wild bear habits.
Continue
As I, he wants more than anything to find any surviving talking beasts and he is almost willing to cross the Great Grimstan Mountains, by himself, to search for them.
Continue
Is there anything else you would like to ask?
Yes...
What would you like to know?
Not right now.
Do you think Ian is alright?
I have watched him grow up all these years and he is even more skilled than me in the wild.
Continue
I am sure he will be okay, he is probably just delayed.
Continue
We should still be diligent and try to meet up with him sooner rather than later.
I hope you are right, Fledge.
Is there anything else you would like to ask?
Yes...
What would you like to know?
Not right now.
What do you think about this Lizard Queen?
She sounds like a real witch and needs to be taught some manners.
Continue
Maybe I should introduce her to my pointy sword.
Easy there...I'm sure you'll get your chance, Fledge.
Is there anything else you would like to ask?
Yes...
What would you like to know?
Not right now.
What do you think about searching for my father, Adwen?
I'm in of course.
Continue
Learning of your father's whereabouts or fate is of the utmost importance.
I agree...
Is there anything else you would like to ask?
Yes...
What would you like to know?
Not right now.
What do you think our chances are of freeing Adwen?
Probably not very good...but that is what makes it so exciting, the challenge.
Continue
We'll have a much better chance with the diversion that Jerun is creating.
I agree, that'll help.
I don't think there are any other viable options anyway.
You're right, this is probably our best chance.
Is there anything else you would like to ask?
Yes...
What would you like to know?
Not right now.
Nothing right now, Fledge.
Nothing right now, Fledge.
